attributes.action: Forbid the use of "employee medicals" as part of the process of making a job offer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Disability discrimination is illegal, yet we still allow employers to conduct a "medical" and to obtain GP reports for prospective employees. On the basis of this medical report many job offers are rescinded. Such medicals should only be permitted to either:
A: Include a staff member in a private health scheme (details must go direct to scheme) or
B: to provide for the employee such adjustments as he/she has requested to enable to them to work. 

This government wants disabled people in work, then they allow this obstacle to employment to remain.
